entries.title: Nobel Prize for chemistry awarded to trio for 'snapping molecules together'
entries.description: American scientists Carolyn Bertozzi and Barry Sharpless shared the award with Denmark's Morten Meldal.

entries.title: Amid Ukraine war, US set to fly Russian cosmonaut to ISS
entries.description: A SpaceX spacecraft is set to carry a Russian woman cosmonaut to the ISS on Wednesday, October 5.
